attributes.action: call for a Public Enquiry into Haringey Council and the cruelty case of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A public enquiry to be held and investigate the errors that led to the death of Baby P and how Haringey Council plans to ensure that after the cruelty case of Baby P that this isn't allowed to happen again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
